body:
> would be just interested to better understand on how to trace this problem to better understand on what to look for.

That's very likely a loader causing this issue.

There are multiple problems that could lead to that:

# Infinite loop

Best try to debug the build:

```
node --inspect node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode=production
```

When it's hanging open chrome://inspect resp edge://inspect

and open the node.js devtools.
wait until it has attached
press pause â¸ in "Source"
check where it's looping

# Something else

Try to figure out which module is causing that:

Instead of `--progress` use

```
new webpack.ProgressPlugin({
  showActiveModules: true // display the current module
})
```

and disable parallelism

```
parallelism: 1
```

That should lead to the module causing the issue.

> When debugging the build, I seem not to get out of the `while (nonTerminal.size > 0)` loop

Ah ok, so it's an infinite loop. That's a bug in this piece of code. For this only the code of the module is relevant. Maybe you can look up `state.module.identifier()` in this code snippet in the devtools.
Is it possible to send me the code of `src/framework/common/las_mod_positions/index.ts`?

issue.title: fix infinite loop in inner graph optimization

repository.name: webpack
repository.description: A bundler for javascript and friends. Packs many modules into a few bundled assets. Code Splitting allows for loading parts of the application on demand. Through "loaders", modules can be CommonJs, AMD, ES6 modules, CSS, Images, JSON, Coffeescript, LESS, ... and your custom stuff.

issue.title: Webpack Stuck at 10% building forever

repository.name: webpack
repository.description: A bundler for javascript and friends. Packs many modules into a few bundled assets. Code Splitting allows for loading parts of the application on demand. Through "loaders", modules can be CommonJs, AMD, ES6 modules, CSS, Images, JSON, Coffeescript, LESS, ... and your custom stuff.

issue.body:
# Bug report Webpack v `5.94.0` stuck at 10% building forever **What is the current behavior?** Result: ``` âžœ web git:(upgrade) âœ— yarn webpack --config webpack.test.js --progress=profile --json=compilation-stats.json 10% building 0/1 entries 0/0 dependencies 0/0 modules^C% ``` I thought initially it was my plugins and loaders, however even after removing everything with minimal configuration to bundle 1 test js file, it just hangs. My `webpack.test.js`: ``` module.exports = { mode: 'development', devtool: 'inline-source-map', entry: { 'tool': './test.js', }, output: { path: '/Users/rtirtasentana/Development/web/dist', filename: '[name].bundle.js', }, stats: { all: false, // Disable all by default timings: true, errors: true, warnings: true, logging: 'verbose', // Show verbose logging reasons: true, // Show reasons why modules are included moduleTrace: true, // Show trace of modules for better debugging }, }; ``` `test.js` is: ``` import React from 'react'; export const MyCompoonent = () => { return (

TestingABC

); }; ``` **What is the expected behavior?** it should run without being stuck **Other relevant information:** (i didn't use any of the packages in the minimal webpack config above but it still hangs) ``` System: OS: macOS 14.6.1 CPU: (16) arm64 Apple M3 Max Memory: 13.45 GB / 64.00 GB Binaries: Node: 18.20.4 - /private/var/folders/8f/g5qfjjhx4h96gvt7jp17yzy00000gn/T/xfs-d14dbc44/node Yarn: 4.4.1 - /private/var/folders/8f/g5qfjjhx4h96gvt7jp17yzy00000gn/T/xfs-d14dbc44/yarn npm: 10.7.0 - ~/.asdf/plugins/nodejs/shims/npm Browsers: Chrome: 128.0.6613.120 Safari: 17.6 Packages: babel-loader: ^9.1.3 => 9.1.3 clean-webpack-plugin: ^4.0.0 => 4.0.0 css-loader: ^7.1.2 => 7.1.2 eslint-import-resolver-webpack: ^0.13.1 => 0.13.9 html-webpack-plugin: ^3.2.0 => 3.2.0 lodash-webpack-plugin: ^0.11.6 => 0.11.6 postcss-loader: ^8.1.1 => 8.1.1 react-loader-spinner: ^3.1.5 => 3.1.14 sass-loader: ^16.0.1 => 16.0.1 style-loader: ^4.0.0 => 4.0.0 terser-webpack-plugin: ^4.2.3 => 4.2.3 url-loader: ^4.1.1 => 4.1.1 webpack: ^5.94.0 => 5.94.0 webpack-bundle-analyzer: ^4.10.2 => 4.10.2 webpack-cli: ^5.1.4 => 5.1.4 webpack-dev-server: ^5.1.0 => 5.1.0 webpack-manifest-plugin: ^5.0.0 => 5.0.0 webpack-merge: ^6.0.1 => 6.0.1 ```
